1.選んだ装備品を 持ちきれません。|冥海の光玉から取り出す装備品を減らすか|持ち物: You can't take out all of the equipment|you've selected. Choose fewer Abyss Orbs or|reorganize your carried equipment.

2.装備品を ひとつも選んでいません。|外に出る時に 選ばなかった装備品は |消えて: You haven't selected any equipment. Any|equipment you do not select will disappear.|Proceed?<yesno><close>

3.選んだ装備品を 冥海の光玉から取り出します。|外に出る時に 選ばなかった装備品は: You'll take the equipment you've chosen. Any|equipment you did not choose will disappear.|Proceed?<yesno><close>

5.冥海の光玉から取り出す装備品を選んで|『けってい』を選択してください。|あと<%: Select the equipment you'd like to unseal|from the Abyss Orbs. You can take <%dB_LIMIT_NUM> piece(s)|of equipment.

6.<color_yellow>|『解放の扉』の説明です！|<br>|解放の扉は 海:
This is an explanation of the "Return|Gate"!|
|The Return Gate is the exit of the ruins|that appears when your Abyss Scales run out.|
|Here, you can select <%dB_LIMIT_NUM> pieces of equipment|sealed in the Abyss Orbs you obtained during|your exploration and unseal them.|
|The Abyss Orbs that you do not select, along|with the equipment contained within, will be|lost when you leave the ruins.|
|The amount of equipment that you can unseal|depends on which floor the Return Gate|appeared. A lower floor means more equipment.|
|Select the equipment you wish to unseal from|the Abyss Orbs you've collected, and then|choose "Confirm".|
|If you need to organize your bag first, press|the cancel button to exit the menu.

7.冥海の光玉を 持っていません。: You don't have any Abyss Orbs.

9.封印を解ける数は <%nB_LIMIT_NUM>個です。|選んだ装備品の数が|封: You can only unseal <%dB_LIMIT_NUM> piece(s)|of equipment. You can't take that many!
